sentence: "Women of reproductive age right now don't know a world that doesn't give them choice," said Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock of Georgia, who is facing a challenge from Trump-endorsed, first-time candidate Herschel Walker.
author: Warren Rojas
title: Biden and Democrats caught flat-footed and without a plan for the possible end of Roe v. Wade

sentence: This fall, Mr. Warnock is expected to face Herschel Walker, the Republican former football star with scant political experience.
title: Democrats Fight Headwinds in Georgia and Beyond: The Problem Is Reality

sentence: This fall, Mr. Warnock is expected to face Herschel Walker, the Republican former football star with scant political experience.
title: Democrats are mindful of headwinds in Georgia, and everywhere else.

sentence: Republicans in two deep-red states are also voting in major Senate contests, while Trump-endorsed Herschel Walker is looking to sew up the nomination for the battleground race in Georgia.
title: Kemp notches huge primary win in Georgia
